{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.<br />These archers wield simple crossbows, and their arrowheads are crafted from carved Electro Crystals that will deliver an electric shock upon impact. They say that hilichurl archers of exceptional skill can fire five crossbow bolts at once–a most impressive feat indeed.|[[Archive]]}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Aimed Shot:''' Charges as Electro energy accumulates on their arrowhead, before firing an arrow at the player, dealing '''150% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
**'''Enhanced:''' Some Hilichurl Shooters, mostly those in the [[Spiral Abyss]], [[Domains]], or overworld events/challenges, are capable of firing five bolts at a time, covering a ~45 degree arc in front of them.
